mapper.select: SELECT t.PriPID AS PriPID, RegNo, EntName, UniCode, LeRep, t1.CerNO AS CardNo, t2.Code AS CerType FROM cs_mid_baseinfo t LEFT JOIN cs_mid_lerep t1 ON t.PriPID=t1.PriPID LEFT JOIN cs_code_certype t2 ON t1.CerType=t2.Code WHERE EntName=#{entName} or UniCode=#{entName} or RegNo=#{entName}

SELECT t.Country, t.Name AS LitiName, t1.Code AS CerType, t.CerNO AS CardNo, t.Sex, t.Tel, t.HouseAdd, t.MobTel Phone FROM cs_mid_person t LEFT JOIN cs_code_certype t1 ON t.CerType=t1.Code WHERE t.CerNO=#{keyword}
SELECT t.BatchNo FROM cs_nocredit_punishinfo t LEFT JOIN cs_nocredit_punishdetail t1 ON t.BatchNo=t1.BatchNo WHERE t1.PriPID=#{priPID} AND t.State >=1 AND t.AuditRes !='1' LIMIT 0,1

SELECT t.BatchNo FROM cs_nocredit_punishinfo t LEFT JOIN cs_nocredit_punishdetail t1 ON t.BatchNo=t1.BatchNo WHERE t1.CardNo=#{cardNo} AND t.State >=1 AND t.AuditRes !='1' AND t.PunType !='ent' LIMIT 0,1

SELECT t1.BatchNo, t1.PriPID, t1.EntName, t1.UniCode, t1.LeRep, t1.CerType, t1.CardNo, t1.LitiName, t1.Phone, t1.Record, t1.RegNO FROM (select cnp.* from cs_nocredit_punishdetail cnp where cnp.CardNo = #{cerNO}) t1 LEFT JOIN cs_mid_baseinfo b ON t1.PriPID = b.PriPID GROUP BY t1.id ORDER BY t1.id DESC
